E3 Report, Day 3
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): E3 Report, Day 3
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, May 21, 2005 - 09:45 pm:

Ok, I know this is a day late, but I've been busy!

The MR team wasn't at the show this year, but I did have a nice chat with many other Tecmo people, including Mr Fukada the president. I am under the impression that they aren't allowed to release much info on MRJ at this time because Nintendo is keeping some details of its wifi strategy under wraps.

I played a ton of games, drank an enormous amount of Mountain Dew (it was free and a real life saver!) and talked to a lot of people. Overall the show was great and Tecmo had an impressive showing.
